text: Roger Searle Penske (born February 20, 1937) is an American businessman and retired auto racing driver. He was born in Shaker Heights, Ohio. His career is based on professional auto racing. He is most famous for his ownership of Team Penske, DJR Team Penske, the Penske Corporation, and other automotive-related businesses. He is known by his nickname of "The Captain". ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American racecar drivers Category:Businesspeople from Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Michigan Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Detroit Category:People from Shaker Heights, Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Detroit
title: Roger Penske
